attributes.action: Force!!! Supermarkets to cut all food Price's in real terms, now that Diesel is much cheaper
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are paying an average of £25-£40 More on our shopping bills every week! It is not fare that we are being Ripped off! When fuel started to rise, Food prices did also immediately every week, But now fuel has come down the food prices have stayed the same! I know, I do the shopping.
Mr Brown why are they getting away with Ripping us off? You would be helping all families in GB, Don't you think it would be a big vote winner if you did this? I can't keep affording 72p for a loaf of bread, that only cost 39p at the start of the summer! Please help us.
